news.title: In maps: The war-ravaged Ukrainian territories at the heart of the Trump-Putin summit
news.summary: Kyiv has rejected ceding territory seized by Russia to secure a ceasefire.

news.title: Manchester Arena bomb plotter charged with attack on prison guards
news.summary: Hashem Abedi is facing five charges including three of attempted murder.

news.title: Claire's falls into administration with 2,150 jobs at risk
news.summary: Claire's has appointed administrators in the UK and Ireland, but its shops will stay open as it considers a possible sale.

news.title: Three children in court accused of man's murder
news.summary: Alexander Cashford, 49, was pronounced dead at the scene in Leysdown-on-Sea in Kent, police said.

news.title: Porn site traffic plummets as UK age verification rules enforced
news.summary: Data suggests leading adult site Pornhub lost more than one million visitors in two weeks.

news.title: Students face nervous overnight wait for A-level, T-level and BTec grades
news.summary: Admissions experts say a record number of 18-year-olds could get into their first choice of university.

news.title: Lammy admits fishing without licence on Vance trip
news.summary: The foreign secretary has written to the Environment Agency to tell them about the error, and has now bought a licence.

news.title: Gaza talks to focus on releasing hostages all in one go, Netanyahu hints
news.summary: Mediators say a deal can be pushed through in the weeks before Israel's planned expansion of the war.

news.title: Migrant hotel resident charged with sexual assault
news.summary: Essex Police says it is not looking for any other suspects in relation to the alleged offences.

news.title: BBC apologises after Jenrick accused of xenophobia
news.summary: A contributor to Radio 4's Thought for the Day slot made the remark about the shadow justice secretary.
